pages.text: Welcome to Terramity!$(br2)Terramity is a mod that adds a lot of what I feel Minecraft is missing. It takes a lot of inspiration from Terraria and you may notice a lot of references to various games.$(br2)This mod focuses on furthering progression with new bosses, ores, weapons, etc.

One of the most important things Terramity adds are the new accessories, with Curios integration.$(br2)Accessories add a lot of variety to how you play the game and often can be more important than the armor you wear. If you feel underpowered, review your equipment and make some upgrades.

Lastly, if you ever feel stuck. Consult this guidebook for what you should do next.$(br2)Having 'EMI' and 'EMI Loot' installed is recommended so you can check what some mobs drop, as it may be necessary to defeat certain mobs to progress through the mod.
The first step-- a cardboard necklace!
